website_summaries.verdict: This luxurious mattress will help you sleep comfortably every night.
pros: Made with bamboo charcoal infusers that remove odors and moisture
Features aloe vera that helps make the mattress a serene place to rest
Superior foam and coils deliver unprecedented support
cons: Not as plush as comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Best nights sleep I have gotten in years!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to see if it would help my back pain in the mornings. I have been sleeping on a high end traditional spring pillow top mattress for years. After three nights on the matress my morning back pain is virtually gone and I sleep through the night. I highly reccomend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT L.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I’m pregnant and really been struggling with getting comfortable at night along with finding something that supports my back. This mattress has exceeded all of my expectations. The first night I slept on it I woke up feeling like a new person. I also tend to over heat while sleeping and haven’t had an issue since sleeping on this mattress. Overall I’m super satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Capener

customer_reviews.title: This is most definitely NOT a plush mattress as advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: This is most definitely NOT a plush mattress as advertised. I’m 6’3”, 225lbs, and when I lay on my back, it’s so firm that my lower back doesn’t even touch the mattress. I’ve only had it a few days, so I’m hoping that will change. I will post an update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I'll make this short. The mattress was great at first. I followed the instructions and rotated it every few weeks. It turned into a 'hammock' after only 5 months. The Amazon exchange period was only 1 month. Now I have to contact Lucid....
customer_reviews.author: S. Firestone

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE SEWAGE AND ROTTEN EGGS
customer_reviews.text: Developed a slight odor the first week. Subtle sewage type smell. 6/18/2020. Mattress continues to have an odor. Still smells like sewage. Very unhappy. 6/25/2020. Sewage, rotten egg smell is so strong and disgusting. We are unable to sleep on the mattress. Decomposing smell is so strong, it stinks up the entire sleeping level of our home. We’ll be contacting Amazon for a full refund. UPDATE: Spoke with “Jackie”, (who was so kind and helpful) at Amazon. Per “Lifetime Policy”, we’re receiving a full refund. Thank you Jackie and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Julie L

customer_reviews.title: Good nights sleep every time.
customer_reviews.text: While it seemed soft compared to my temperpedic, it slept very comfortable, plus I found I could once again sleep on my side. I will be buying another mattress from this company. The only minor issue is that the sides are quite soft, where more firmness is needed to sit up on the edge of the bed, but that is no deal breaker at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maureenguthner

customer_reviews.title: Stinky literally
customer_reviews.text: Mattress stinks like a sewer. Very dissatisfied with the smell. Love the bed but can't take the rotten smell. Probably something with the activated charcoal layer. Waiting for Amazon to arrange a pickup. If they all don't stink, which according to other reviews they don't seem to, I would chance another because it's really comfortable. Maybe consider the latex hybrid that does not have the charcoal layer. It's says it's closer to firm if that true and the charcoal layer hybrid is medium( it's very firm) the laytex one may be like a rock. Will update when Amazon gets this one. Waiting over two weeks for them to contact me with someone to pick it up...
customer_reviews.author: Brtblueyes

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new house, and needed to update our mattress. We have been sleeping on a 10yrs+ old pillow top mattress, so it was time for a new one. I'm so impressed with how fast the mattress went from being compressed in the box, to expanding into a queen size mattress. The covering is plush feeling, and the mattress is super comfortable. Not to firm and not to soft. I'm a side sleeper and my body conforms to the mattress for a great night sleep. I like the fact that it has coils, in my mind I feel it will hold it's shape better. I'm super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: K Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Not Cool or Firm
customer_reviews.text: Miserable for stomach sleepers - not firm enough to support lower back, so lots of lower back strain. Doesn't cool either - I wake up hot and sweaty every night; I'm in my 20s. Hate it, and I guess I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not great as described
customer_reviews.text: Been waking up with backaches on this mattress. It wasnt an issue before. If you are willing to add couple more hundreds, go for casper.
customer_reviews.author: trustMe

customer_reviews.title: So good we bought another
customer_reviews.text: We bought the full size mattress for our son, and we liked it so much that we cancelled an order for a regular mattress from a national department store, and bought another one of these in a queen size. Both boys love their new mattresses. There was no odor when the mattresses were unrolled, and I was shocked at how quickly they uncompressed.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as I needed it to be.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to give a negative review because the mattress is well made and it’s holding its shape very nicely. My only beef is that the mattress is much firmer than the reviews indicate. I’m 6’1” @ 210lbs and I thought the mattress would have some give because of my size, however I’m still waking up with sore hips and shoulders. Unfortunately I have to sleep on my side and this causes tremendous pressure points, if you have similar issues, this may not be the mattress for you. I’ve had the mattress two months, I’ll see if it softens up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Smells like an poop.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress smells like an outhouse, I have had a fan on this thing for a week and I’m fanning a turd. I wish there were some way to bolt it down inside of the house where the manufacturers lives. Scumbags. Edit: In addition, this mattress was a factor in the end of my three year relationship. “Did you fart?” She never listens anyway so whatever.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul

customer_reviews.title: The Stench from Mattress Hell Ep. 1: Too Damn Firm
customer_reviews.text: Firmer than I had hoped. Works well for partner, but I've had two back surgeries and I'm a side sleeper so the mattress is just slightly too firm. Making matters worst, I have had the mattress since May 20ish 2020, it's July now and the smell is gosh darn awful. It's putrid, like my partner and I are having fart wars in our sleep. Our room smells like literal fart. Our roommate and guests have all pointed it out. Just now really looking into how to fix this. I'm disappointed. It's 2:00 A.M., I work at 8am, but I can't sleep because the smell is making me sick.
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: Great value and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them. Great value and they are very comfortable. We purchased a $4000 sleep number bed like idiots and hated it. These are much better at 1/8 the price.
customer_reviews.author: NotaFastM

customer_reviews.title: Bad bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed sucks bad you sink into the middle doesn’t really go 10 inches and I asked amazon what to do because I can’t fit the bed back into the small box it came in and they can’t do anything! Would not buy this bed
customer_reviews.author: quinn

customer_reviews.title: Smells like sewage!
customer_reviews.text: While this is a very comfortable mattress, it has a strong sewage smell that hasn’t gone away. We purchased this mattress almost a month ago. At first we were checking our bathrooms for toilet leaks. Our entire house smelled like sewage. We finally pinpointed the mattress as the source of the smell. The smell is now confined to the bedroom, but none the less is still overpowering! We continue to air it out daily to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Chanse

customer_reviews.title: My back is killing me!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these mattresses to go with our adjustable bed and they arrived in great condition and on time. We followed the instructions of laying them flat to air out for 24 hours, then placed them on our adjustable frame. They move easily and feel comfortable, BUT when we wake up in the morning.... every bone/joint aches! Unfortunately, the window to return them is 30 days and it was about 90 days before we realized what was causing us so much discomfort. Save yourself the trouble of buying these particular mattresses and if you still insist on buying these, call me, I've got two to sell you.
customer_reviews.author: BethC7

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is making me sick, I can't return it. It's going in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Eason

customer_reviews.title: It stinks
customer_reviews.text: One whole month with this mattress and it still smells like rotten eggs! I’ve tried letting it air out I’ve sprayed enzyme solution on it and nothing works. It smells so bad I wish I could get a refund without having to spend 100 dollars just to send it back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Smells like rotten eggs
customer_reviews.text: The bed smells like Rotten eggs!!! It’s horrible. Called the manufacturer they said it’s probably a Manufacture defect spent loads of laundry washing out sheets and pillows now our room smells horrendous!!! The smell is so awful we can’t even sleep on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Karenn

customer_reviews.title: dont believe all the reviews you read
customer_reviews.text: if I had to do it again, I would not buy this bed, woke up and my back was killing me. they say good support, I say bull crap. don't walk but run away from this item. customer service from amazon was no help.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but the smell was not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law has the same brand bed but different model and it’s wonderful- unfortunately it seems they are not making it anymore so we went with this one. The bed was comfortable enough- the middle was fine the sides a little too plush for my liking but we were planning on only using it for a year and moving it to the guest bedroom anyways. The true problem was the smell. It smelt of chemicals and moth balls. If the bedroom had been shut up all day it was overwhelmingly strong. Gave it 3 weeks and we’re done. We decided not worth the price and are returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!! Very itchy.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to itch all night this is the bed for you. Whoever thought of putting what feels fiberglass in fabric was a genius. Horrible, would not recommend. Unfortunately we are stuck with this until we can find a new one on a budget. It was okay for about the first 6 months and then the mattress protector started coming apart and making all the fiberglass or whatever it is embed in our skin. My poor children and I have been miserable. You can see the tiny fibers/feather like stuff everywhere now!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this mattress. I bought it 7 months ago and honestly it’s more comfortable to sleep on the ground. It looses any support after 3 months and my husband and I wake up with worse back pain than we went to bed with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bed for about a week and it's a big improvement from my old bed. It is a little firmer than I was expecting but it's pretty supportive. Will update the review in a couple months when summer rolls around to see how hot it sleeps. Update 7/26/18: So far so good. My wife and I both really like the mattress. Its softened up a bit since my first writing of the review. Right now we are experiencing a heat wave here in San Diego and it's been fairly warm during the evenings. Neither of us has really had any issues with the bed retaining heat or anything. Really have enjoyed it thus far
customer_reviews.author: Stonechaw

customer_reviews.title: Update: do not buy!!!! I'd exchange for a softer Lucid brand mattress
customer_reviews.text: Update: after 4 months of use it is dipping bad on one side. Super disappointed with this mattress and won't buy again. I need a new mattress already. I actually really like the quality of the mattress and after a month of use, I like Lucid brand. However it is so very firm!!!! Way firmer than expected. I have always purchased firm beds but this one causes me to wake up in soooooo much back pain. It is awful!! I wish I could just exchange it in a store for a softer Lucid brand mattress but looks like I'm stuck with it thanks to online shopping. 🤷‍♀️ Beware of how firm it actually is!! Great quality materials for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn C.

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend for extracurricular activities with your lover though
customer_reviews.text: I work long days and after I do I fall into this bed and drift off on this cloud. I read reviews that said it was firm, but mine is literally squish. We have named it squish bed. I do not recommend for extracurricular activities with your lover though, like doing it in quick sand.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Was leary ordering a mattress online but did my investigation and also read all the reviews. Hav3 had the mattress for about 2 weeks and I absolutely love it. It came in a tall skinny box, opened it and the mattress started to expand. It was fun watching it expand which only took anout 20 minutes. I didn’t use it for 2 days and let it breathe for 2 days.for me, this mattress is heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: False advertising on 100 night trial.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. If you are unhappy with it after opening seller trending America won’t refund within the 100 night risk free trail advertised. What good is a trial period if you can’t open it for a trial period.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible mattress. Insane price!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I have been sleeping on this mattress for about 2 months now. It's the best sleep we've gotten in the longest time. I am a stomach/side sleeper and he's a back/side sleeper and it's great for the both of us. We can't feel each other toss and turn or get in and out of bed. Even when our 85lb pup jumps on the bed, we can't feel it...and he is NOT graceful. I can't say enough good things about this mattress. I would purchase this for every room.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany K

customer_reviews.title: Worst amazon purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Worst amazon purchase I have made in the past 13 years. Eight months I have owned it. The first four months I hated it because it slept hot. Now it is waking me up after four hours from the terrible pain in my back, shoulders, arms, hips, neck, legs and feet.. From head to toe pain. I am a side sleeper. I will never buy a mattress online again. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Worth It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sooooo hesitant about this mattress but nothing could be worse than what we already had. My husband found this after doing a lot of research and for the price, convenience and reviews, we thought why not. BEST DECISION EVER!!!!! We love this mattress and are so happy we bought it. It unfolded well, although upside down haha. It’s been a couple weeks now of much better sleep. And we don’t wake each other when getting in and out of bed!! We are both bigger people, over 6ft tall and this has been great for us. If it changes, I will update my review, but as it stands right now this mattress is heaven!! 🙌🙌🙌
customer_reviews.author: S.Welch

customer_reviews.title: No happy
customer_reviews.text: Bed never expanded to 10” only to about 8” There really isn’t much support to the bed of you step on the bed you will feel the very bottom. The edge support is even worse. Made my back ache.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping in the clouds
customer_reviews.text: Lovelovelove this bed. I know that looks juvenile, but I can't express how fantastic it is. I believe you have to give the first night a free pass because your body has to adjust (I was a bit door after the first night of sleep on it), but since then I've slept like a baby on this mattress. It's probably about 50 steps above my previous mattress that was really hard except for the giant hole in the middle of it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ostler

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bed came early and was easy to set up. The instructions say it takes 48 hours to expand, but mine was less. Since sleeping on this bed, I wake up more energized and less tired. You can't beat this price, I researched everywhere before buying this bed. Great investment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: No back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed for about 2 years. I have severe back issues with muscle spasms. I wake up every morning without back pain. I haven’t had a single muscle spasms while laying in this bed. This is by far the most comfy mattress I have ever purchased. I do not have a box spring and the mattress sits on a low profile frame. *Note I am extremely allergic to fiberglass and have never had any type of issues. Beware of fake posts from people telling you there is fiberglass in the bed. If there were, I would be in the ER.
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: Love the mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love the mattress, It took a few hrs to expand to full size and yes it did have some foam stinky smell when opened but first nights sleep was great. I may buy more for the guest bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is too hard. I've been sleeping on it for about a month and my back pain has greatly increased. Not comfortable, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Adelle Williams

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the mattress two hours ago. Box came in perfect condition. Mattress is already at the full 12ins but will leave it over night just in case. Did have a slight chemical odor when I first opened it’s already going away. There were a couple reviews about fiber glass coming from bottom checked bottom of mattress and didn’t see anything. Mattress is on the firm side the description says medium plush that’s not accurate at all. Mattress is affordable for a hybrid but I guess you pay for what you get. Doesn’t give much support if you are a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Huerta

customer_reviews.title: I'm A Believer Now!
customer_reviews.text: Like most of you I was like no way a mattress for a $400 dollar matress could compare to a Temper Pedic Mid-Firm Adapt matress. Oh boy was I wrong... I'm 5'8 260lb, don't judge me lol, sleeps great for me on my back, side, and stomach. FYI I just returned my $1300 Sealy icomfort firm; no regrets... No smell to matress when opening it. They want you to wait 48 hours to use i lol, but you now...!
customer_reviews.author: unknownsoldier....

customer_reviews.title: Here's everything you need to know in 1 review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress along with a bedframe that required no box spring, I will say the mattress is beautiful and very comfortable, you MUST get the protector sheet otherwise I'm unsure how long the quality of the mattress would last if something were spilled, it's very soft. Definitely will need help carrying box, make sure you have floor space or somewhere FLAT to lay the mattress from 48-72 hours as when it arrives it is extremely compacted into a box and literally reminds me of those little animals you put in water that grow, except no water for this just let it sit and yeah there's my review. Planning on purchasing again for my son's upgrade. Would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleCity

customer_reviews.title: If you have back issues BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress along with the Best Price Mattress metal box springs (pics attached without cover and with). I cannot believe the quality of everything for the price. This is a highly supportive mattress. I have severe back issues and for the first time in years I feel relief when I lay down as well as the next morning. I’m not one to write a review, but this mattress is fantastic and you can’t beat the price. I convinced my husband to get on board with a “box mattress” that inflates when opened by telling him, “if we hate it we’ll put it in the guest room” one night on it and he’s sold.
customer_reviews.author: LSDANGO

customer_reviews.title: Just 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mattress at first but now, after just 6 months, it's sagging in the middle and uncomfortable. Probably a good mattress for a guest room but not for every night use.
customer_reviews.author: Pisces

customer_reviews.title: Helps with arthritis and Fibromyalgia pain and sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful mattress for my husband and I. I have arthritis and Fibromyalgia. He works his butt off in roofing and maintenance. This mattress helps me to not toss and turn all night and get all cramped up. He sleeps really well and wakes well rested. It took about 2 days for the full expansion as it stated in the instruction page. No smell lingered after the first couple of hours. Love my bed again!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Giusa

customer_reviews.title: It is more firm than either of us anticipated but in a good way. Good for back sleeping but really a ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for two months now and we are really liking it. Our first experience with a memory foam mattress and it took some getting used to. It is more firm than either of us anticipated but in a good way. Good for back sleeping but really a stand out to me as a side sleeper. We now refer to it as our marshmallow bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love our new bed! We got the adjustable frames as well to make a king size bed. We got "split king" sheets, these come with two twin XL fitted sheets, one king size flat sheet and two king size pillow cases. I like a firm mattress and was afraid this mattress would not be firm enough for me. I also was afraid the edge would collapse or make me feel like I could fall off. I had nothing to worry about. I can't even remember that I am lying on a mattress when I get in bed. I think that is a sign of a mattress that matches my need for rest.
customer_reviews.author: Roe LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Back hurts
customer_reviews.text: Received two twins to replace single standard mattress- I really want to like this mattress, initially when I purchased it I also ordered a charcoal 2" memory foam topper to help join the two beds together- That seemed way to plush and eventually removed it- for the last little bit I've been waking up with a sore back so i don't know if it's still to plush, wish I might have gotten the gel mattress instead, as it might have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Mr smith

customer_reviews.title: it is comfortable. I don't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was late to arrive, I wish I would've bought the 12 inch. It works for what we needed to, it is comfortable. I don't regret this purchase, but I can already see some breakdown, so I don't know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Abzeez

customer_reviews.title: One problem, I don't want to get out of bed in the morning...
customer_reviews.text: One problem, I don't want to get out of bed in the morning... Both me and the wife are side sleepers, this is nice and plush, but not too plush, perfect for sleeping on your side, back and stomach. We tried memory foam mattresses in all the local stores, most priced over $1,000 and as high as $2,600. we both like this much better! And for ~$600 for a king size, it's a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: iSim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly impressed with the mattress, especially for the price. The King 12-inch is a perfect match for both my SO (who prefers a softer mattress) and me (preferring a little more firm) and 2 medium-sized dogs. There is very little motion transfer and the support is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S

customer_reviews.title: Supportive while still being soft
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mattress for one of our children, but that could also be used as a guest bed. I have tried memory foam mattresses before & found that I prefer more support than they offer. I decided to try a hybrid & have been 100% pleased with this mattress. It is both supportive & soft. You sink in just enough to be comfortable not to the point of making a “dent” in it that is hard to roll out of. After trying it out I’d like to replace all of our mattresses with one of these! You won’t be disappointed if you buy one!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!! For a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved how firm AND plush this mattress is at the same time!! I was very leery of ordering a foam mattress not having tried it out. I read all of the reviews and couldn't believe all the rave for such a decent price, soo we decided to give it a try. This is the best mattress I have ever owned!! Its Motionless!!! And no more waking up sore or propping myself with pillows everywhere to get comfortable. We got the 12 in. Queen Charcole and aloe infused... We have had it for 5 months now and it's still amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Painful mattress
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year sides of mattress are breaking down. When my husband lays down the mattress dips in his direction. I feel like I am sleeping on a hill. This mattress is very uncomfortable and hot. It isn't firm or soft. After a month we were in extreme pain and should have returned. That was our bad as we were worried about how you would return such a large item. We added a mattress topper. It helped. Now instead of extreme pain we just ache when we wake up. The topper also helped with the heat. We are now in the market for a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: LueAnna

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: I had really hoped that this bed would be perfect for us. I read almost every review before pulling the trigger! But the truth is that this bed is literally as hard as a rock. It's one of the most uncomfortable beds I have ever slept on. Medium plush feel? Puh-lease! I can't believe this is supposedly made of memory foam. Yes, it's really that bad. But now we don't have money to buy another mattress, so I'm just stuck with it, and all the back and neck pain that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christimin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but sleeps hot
customer_reviews.text: SLEEPS HOT! Now before I explain that, I will say it is a VERY comfortable mattress. I gave it 5 stars for comfort. It actually does reduce back pain depending how you sleep. I had some lower back pain and it got rid of that. The medium plush is where it’s at because it’s softer, I don’t like firm mattresses but it’s all user preference. Now back to the hot part. I feel there’s little to no breathing with this mattress. It couldn’t be my sheet and how I sleep on it. It could very well be that. Though I have sweat nearly every night sleeping in this mattress. Not tremendously but enough for it to be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: The Lucid 12" Twin XL Hybrid Mattress is the Best Thing Ever For My Back!
customer_reviews.text: I have had two back surgeries over the years and have had back pain to go along with it. My wife and I decided it was time to get a Lucid adjustable bed with a Lucid 12" Twin XL Hybrid Mattress. I have used this combination since May 2020 and wished I had done this years ago. Its the first time I have been able to sleep all night continuous since I can remember! I found out for me that if I raised the back and legs up about 20 degrees that this was the best position for me to get a good nights sleep! .
customer_reviews.author: PapaJim

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been sleeping on this mattress for a while now and we love it! We upgraded from a queen size of the same mattress so that is obviously amazing to have more space, but aside from that we are loving this mattress! It is the perfect balance of soft and firm! You do have to make sure to get the correct base though because it needs one with slats or a box spring to hold it up, especially on the corners. The box is SUPER heavy but it rolled out great and didn’t have a funky smell or anything. Overall though, super awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, comfort and no has
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is heavy! Handled it by myself...not too smart. It had no smell to it at all! Best night's sleep in a long time. The mattress is soft but the hybrid inner springs provide real firm support so you get the best of both worlds. When combined with the adjustable base it's real comfortable. I was expecting to pay 2-3x the price if I bought locally. I risked the online purchase and it has seemed to be the best choice even with delivery. Ordered it Tuesday and it came Thursday.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Supportive, great size, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a mattress for our toddler who has been spoiled sleeping on our nice mattress for so long that he refused to sleep on his crib mattress. We definitely found what we were looking for with this- it’s supportive, and has a great level of softness while staying firm enough so that you don’t sink in completely like many memory foam mattresses do. Our toddler is finally sleeping through the night in his own room, which means we are also finally sleeping through the night too. The twin XL is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Becca P

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very plush. Almost hard to roll over in. I am sleeping much better than I did on my $2000 sleep number bed. It's a really good deal for the price. Beware if you don't like a very soft mattress though. No issues with the smell or the expanding.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rees

customer_reviews.title: Vendor says medium plush...i'd say MUSH
customer_reviews.text: just way to soft, mush mush mush and not at all comfortable. Totally collapses as soon as you sit on bed and craters during the night. It's only been 2 nights but I would not recommend this mattress at all, not even for an unwelcome guest.
customer_reviews.author: sv

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress! I could almost instantly feel the effects of my back taking a deep breath and shedding the pain of my old mattress. I definitely had some lucid dreams for the first couple months of sleeping in it which was coincidental to the brand and that was probably my body unwinding from years of sleeping on a bad mattress. Very comfortable but it is a little bit too squishy around the edges ans tends to lose its shape near the bottom and top corners.
customer_reviews.author: alexandria capra

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: After shopping around we got this mattress. The hybrid deep plush. It's not as plush as I originally thought. But I was having backpain and now I'm not. I find it comfortable. The bed definitely removes a good amount of movement from the bed. I can get up without waking up my wife. However the edge support feels like it's not there. I've never had a pure memory foam mattress so maybe this is better? But if I sit on the edge (135 lbs) I will slip off if I don't rest my feet on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent G.

customer_reviews.title: Smell is Wretched.
customer_reviews.text: Read the one star reviews! Yikes. This thing smells and the smell does not get better. It gets WORSE. Do not buy this mattress unless you enjoy sleeping to the sweet smell of sulfur. It’s so, so gross— even with a waterproof mattress protector and a 2” mattress topper. It’s very comfortable, but I can’t sleep on it because of the stench.... Gah!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the mattress for 3 months. Its my first memory foam mattress. Im happy to no longer wake up in pain. Its well worth the price. My only gripe is the funky smell- it showed up a week or 2 after setting up the mattress, and lasted until just recently (2 months). It smelled in the morning after I woke up, body heat seemed to be the trigger. Im glad its gone. I was aware of the possibility from my research, as I researched for weeks before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some guests like it, some don't.
customer_reviews.text: We researched extensively before buying a gel-based mattress before buying this one. It had no bad odor like many people complained about with gel mattresses. It expanded nicely but weighs a ton so it's hard for me to put sheets on it. I do have arthritis in my hands so may not be an issue for others. I queried all ofmyvisitors that slept on it. 4 said it was fine. 2 ssid their head felt lower than their body slthough the bed is level. I tried it and finally got out of bed at 4am after a severly restless night. I feltlike I was sinking down in the bed. So the jury is out. 50-50 pretty much.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn Yeti Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Smell.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is awful. These mattresses are plenty comfy if you can even get in the room with the smell. We noticed it after about a week maybe two.... even after airing them out. We’ve tried it all. Sprays, cleansers, every google tip their is. We’ve even had our kids jump on them to break up “gas bubbles” that the internet searches claim may be releasing the smell. Worst purchase I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we didn't buy the 1200$ mattress we looked at because this thing is great! Just make sure you have it where you want it upon opening. It's sealed in a huge roll inside the box. Ours immediately deflated (or inflated?) upon opening. We had it sideways and thank goodness it was halfway deflated. Had it been finished expanding it was going to be impossible! This is a good thing, meaning you're not buying some piece of foam. Not literally! No chemical smell or any problems. It was WELL worth it. It's comfortable and extremely affordable. There's different preferences; firm, medium, plush medium, etc. We have plush medium. We are buying more for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I let the mattress air out for a week while we waited on our bed frame to arrive. During that time the mattress felt soft on the top but still sturdy and overall exactly what we were wanting in a new mattress. After assembling the bed and putting a mattress cover and fitted sheet on the mattress it feels significantly firmer than before. We are hoping it softens up a little over time but you can’t beat the value for this mattress. We ordered a king and after a week it sleeps great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Way softer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bed. It seemed so cozy the first few nights and had zero smell. Unfortunately by the end of the week we find ourselves waking to climb out of the depressions in the mattress. We are large side of average, but didn't expect sleeping on a marshmallow.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool mom

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly hesitant to order but it was on sale and my son needed a mattress. I figured it really couldn't be worse than his current mattress...it has been great. He says it's much more comfortable than his old one, I do notice there isn't much edge support but that wasn't a deal breaker for us. It was easy to get up to the second floor, opened easy and only a slight smell, but honestly I think it was just the plastic it was wrapped in. Absolutely no hesitation about ordering more for my other sons.
customer_reviews.author: Ed19

customer_reviews.title: Comfort over a horrible scent.
customer_reviews.text: The is amazing haven't had any issues bought it on April 30th. My only complaint is that it smells I followed all the directions and let it air once opened and it was fine after a few days but a month in it had a rotten egg smell. The company said that is normal it will go away. Its September 8th and I can faintly smell it. My sibling bought the same mattress around this time and does the exact same thing. For a great mattress this is Its downfall. Can someone please recommend something to help with the smell at this point I'm ready to toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Danita F.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bed!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS BED. After shopping at retail stores and finding out that the bed I needed for back pain and over all comfort was close to $3,000 I turned to online. I was SUPER skeptical about buying this bed online. With that being said I trusted the reviews and went for it. The box says to let it sit for 48 hours but we couldn’t wait. We slept on it after opening for 3 hours and it was great. We have had it for about 2 weeks and have never had better nights sleep! Perfect mix for comfort and support. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Full firmness
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both slim and maybe other reviewers are heavier. This matress hurts us! I had a cold and felt like I had the flu because my whole back hurt! I ended up sleeping on the couch waiting for a matress topper to arrive. Now that we have a foam topper, it's still hurting but not as bad. Not worth trying to return. We're hoping it'll soften with age. Definitely not medium like I thought. It's full firm.
customer_reviews.author: Jordanya

customer_reviews.title: Very good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: First time sleeping on a hybrid. Used a traditional coil for all of my life. The softer sides take a little getting used to, but once you are in the bed, the support is nice. I do sink in a bit (5-10 175 pounds) but the coils do add to the support. Thinking that maybe I should have tried the latex version as that tends to be a little firmer, but after 1 month I am still getting a nice nights sleep. Got it for under 400 bucks so really its a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: WilliW

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead! Let Lucid hug your aching bones!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress for 7 days, I haven’t slept this good in years! My lower back no longer aches when I wake up, I don’t toss and turn and the best part? It’s cozy not too hot not too cold. Firmness is perfect! I researched everyday for a week on which “bed in a box” to purchase, this bed has great reviews AND the price point was insane! You will not regret getting this bed Customer service has been top notch as well. I highly recommend pulling the trigger on this fantastic deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Wynegar

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this bed for about a year and it was an awesome buy! My husband is a large man, 6’9” and 280 pounds and so far no body impressions in the mattress. It’s firm but comfortable. I’m a stomach and side sleeper and I sleep through the night without tossing and turning. Great mattress at a great price. And ours didn’t have a bad odor and inflated to full size right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Egg Fart Smelling Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress in Queen size after enjoying the King size purchased. Mattress delivered with a hole in it and smelly. I didn't give that much thought, knowing it would air out and clear up. NO! It still smells! Received a replacement a few days later. No hole. I've had it for almost a month! Allowed it to air out and it still smells like rotten eggs!!! The manufacturer passed the buck back to Amazon stating that it's not defective and refused to assist. Amazon was great! But now I have two mattresses to dispose of to stop my home smelling like stinky egg farts!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this when I was 7 months pregnant because I couldn't stand our old one any longer. It was the most comfortable sleep I had being pregnant (and that is hard to say!). Now that I am no longer pregnant, I still love this mattress! It is comfortable and holds up - medium firmness, but still cozy and wraps around your body. We researched several mattress like this and we decided on this one. I am not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Wells

customer_reviews.title: Shocked by how much I like this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to asssemble. Never had a 12 inch mattress before. I love it. I feel like I'm at a luxury hotel. I don't know how this will hold up but my 1700 mattress I bought 3 years ago didn't hold up so well. This is equal or superior to that. Firmness is great. Cooling effects are great. I can't say enough good things about this mattress. Note: I like a firm mattress and I am thrilled with this. I'm going to call customer service and tell them how amazing this is and I don't have time to do things like that! Great value for the money, not wild about the name but can't have everything!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but horrible smell.
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a good mattress that didn’t cost an arm and a leg. After many YouTube videos and online forums, I decided to try out this one. Mattress came very fast and delivered straight to my front door (another decision factor). The only downfall to this mattress was the smell. It had a horrible gaseous odor. Thank goodness I didn’t need to use this mattress right away because I had to have a fan blowing on it and windows and doors open for about a month for it to subside. As for comfort it’s amazing. I usually get pain in my hip area and I didn’t feel a thing sleeping on this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rotator cuff pain GONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had rotator cuff surgery a year ago and for the last 3 months I thought I'd have to get a second surgery. I had a memory foam mattress before which seemed plush and soft, but it turns out that it was killing my shoulder. Advil at bedtime, but still awake at 4AM every morning, having to switch sides every 20 minutes. I switched to this mattress and after 1 night, I was sleeping through the night. Get this mattress if you have shoulder pain and don't want to spend a lot.
customer_reviews.author: krc

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time bought a mattress in a box...NEVER AGAIN! I bought these mattresses for my guest room. Very easy setup. However after a couple of days, the smell was UNBEARABLE. Returning is not easy - in fact almost impossible. Both boxes were badly damaged when delivered so I tossed them immediately. There was no way to get the mattress back in the box. Also, I would have to pay to ship them back. I've been trying different methods to get rid of the smell with no success. These mattresses are headed for the dump.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: It Took Five Weeks for the Smell to Go Away!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress arrived smelling like pungent animal urine. As soon as you walked into the bedroom you could smell it. We left it unused with no sheets on it for 5 weeks in an air conditioned house before it finally dissipated. The smell was not just in one spot on the mattress. It was all over it which indicates it was a chemical or material causing the nasty smell. To the manufacturer: If you know the cause of this problem please indicate the cause. If you corrected this problem would you please share the solution? Many other reviewers have complained about the smell. This is unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Stair Climber

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fantastic mattress. We bought it for our son's first "real bed" as we transitioned him from his toddler bed. Box is heavy but easy to unpack. Everyone who lays on it ends up falling asleep, it's SO comfortable. Soft to the touch, not much firmness but my son loves his bed since day one and I'm one happy momma! And I needed to review because I'm tired of those who talk down on mattresses from a box because we've scored with LUCID!
customer_reviews.author: Sil Ort

customer_reviews.title: back pain
customer_reviews.text: back pain for first two weeks while adjusting to mattress. it's okay. not crazy about it. but good price compared to local mattress places. also put it on a platform and no box spring. maybe that makes a difference?
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Gingold

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mattress We own
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress for back or stomach sleepers. It has great support while still having good flexibility. Received mattress with a safe cutter to open and not harm the mattress. Mattress doesn’t have the gas smell like most foam mattresses do at first so that was very nice. I would definitely buy more when we need to replace our other mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Robertson15

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep awaits!
customer_reviews.text: So far these mattresses are incredible. They are slightly firm but not overly firm. They are perfect for our adjustable bed. The bottom of the mattresses have little grippys to help keep them in place. Unfortunately we also got the Lucid mattress covers to protect them but they do NOT have the grippys so the mattresses seem to wander a little bit. Great mattress for the price!
customer_reviews.author: blubusdrvr

customer_reviews.title: Our 3rd Lucid Hybrid
customer_reviews.text: After getting a king size for our room & a full size for our guest room, we got this twin size for a daybed in the office. LOVE the balance of cushion & support. I have a bad back so finding a mattress that works has been a year-long journey. Hope they don't stop making this one! It sleeps great for me (5'3" 120#) and my husband (5'6" 180#).
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is not medium-plush at all! It is extremely firm. The coils are very stiff, and so is the memory foam. Sleeping on my side hurts my hips so much that I woke up sore the first night sleeping on it. I am a side sleeper, but have turned into a back/stomach sleeper since I have started sleeping on this mattress. I am very bony at 5'11" and 140 lbs, so maybe that is why I am having problems, but I haven't had this issue with mattresses before. I waited over a week in the hopes that it would soften up, and I think it has a tiny bit, but it still hurts my hips. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Took a month for that 'smell' to go away...
customer_reviews.text: Beware- there IS that chemical/memory foam smell that makes you wonder if you're inhaling toxins AND it took about a month for me to not smell it... as strongly. I still can smell it slightly at night, but it's very faint. That's the only con - otherwise, it's a very comfortable bed and so easy having it shipped/unrolled/set-up that I still recommend it to friends. Also, make sure your bedframe isn't a solid platform. This mattress needs to vent - if not, it does get hot while sleeping - a slatted bedframe fixed that issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mare C

customer_reviews.title: My little dude likes it, must be good
customer_reviews.text: We received it this morning great surprise thought it would be after we got home from church. My son was excited to open it. It took a lot of self control to not jump on it to feel it out. It started shaping right away. Left it to settle. So far we’re happy, saw some matteresses at other stores today he said his is better still. Emailed the company to ask about the gaps in the bed frame they were quick to respond which is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe J. Flores III

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Firm
customer_reviews.text: I just got the mattress a few days ago and I let it breath for 48 hours, so far this bed is NOT plush with deep sink, it’s firm with very little sink to no sink. I’m going to give it a few days to break in but if it stays like this it will be going back to Lucid
customer_reviews.author: Chewy V

customer_reviews.title: Already fell asleep
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived this morning before work, just in time to unpack and let it expand. When I got home, I layed down on it to test it out, while browsing the internet on my phone. About two minutes later I fell asleep and stayed asleep for a couple of hours. I haven't been sleeping well as my last mattress was worn out after six years of good use. I've been experiencing major back and neck pain from my old mattress. Today when I woke up from my nap, my pain was gone! I'm pretty amazed that a nap could eliminate my back and neck pain, but it did. I'll update my review if anything changes, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceManSpiff

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, I’m very happy, but not plush.
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on this mattress for a full week and I am very happy with my choice. It inflated almost immediately but I waited a full 24 hours before sleeping on it. No bad smell, no mold or bed bugs.... I did hours of research online and decided on the lucid in my price range, I would go with the purple mattress if I had more to spend. My only complaint or note would be I don’t see this mattress as a “medium-plush” which is why I went with the hybrid mattress vs an all foam bed. As far as I can tell my mattress is a solid 5 on the firmness scale.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Massive Improvement
customer_reviews.text: The brand new full Queen mattress in our brand new RV was a absolutely horrible. It was so hard it might as well been made of concrete. This mattress is awesome. Slightly cushioned top, normal firm below. Installation: This thing is heavy! DIY? No way. You need someone to help! It won’t explode when removed from box, or when the outer plastic is removed. It WILL expand quickly when the inner plastic wrapping is cut. It flattens fast, 30 seconds, and will slide around with relative ease once flat. Super-nice mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress, so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: It is like sleeping on a cloud. I'm a side sleeper and previously had a traditional spring mattress that had worn out is welcome. I am so glad I took a chance and ordered this bed online. The box was quite large and beat up, but the mattress was perfect. It fully expanded within about 2-3 hours and I slept on it that evening. I honestly have not had a better sleep than this. It cannot be beat for the price and quality. If you are considering a memory foam mattress but need some more support, consider this hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA

customer_reviews.title: If you like it firm....
customer_reviews.text: More firm than I expected. I am a side sleeper and my hips are constantly sore now. But my husband who enjoys napping on the floor says the bed is fine. Nothing exciting. I will be looking for a plush mattress topper now. Wish I would have bought the 12" originally. Maybe it would have been better.... no way to know since I cant ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: This s a beautiful mattress that is very comfortable, not too soft, not too firm. It also works well on our adjustable bed, we used two of these to make a King, no problems there. So far we haven 't had any sinking, but we've only had it for about 4 months. Oh, and we had never bought a mail order mattress before, it was awesome! Super easy delivery, and letting it out of the box and watching it puff up into shape was worth the price of admission!!! Minus 1 star because the top of the mattress is pure white cotton, almost like a pillow-top, and yet it doesn't seem to zip off easily for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: GG Snaps

product_meta.title: LUCID 10 Inch Queen Hybrid Mattress - Bamboo Charcoal and Aloe Vera Infused Memory Foam - Moisture Wicking - Odor Reducing - CertiPUR-US Certified
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style Name:10 inch Mattress OnlyThis revolutionary LUCID 10 Inch Bamboo Charcoal and Aloe Vera Hybrid mattress will change the way you sleep. The natural odor reducing and temperature regulating properties of memory foam infused with bamboo charcoal combine with the relaxing properties of aloe vera for luxury at an affordable price. The three layers of cushioned foam are supported by 5. 5 inch individually wrapped steel coils for a soft mattress backed with gentle and enduring support. Bringing luxury to the masses, this mattress will have you sleeping serenely in no time. Protected by a 10 year against manufacturer defects.
feature_bullets: Bamboo charcoal infusions eliminate odors and pull moisture away from the skin for a naturally hypoallergenic bed
High-quality transition foam infused with aloe vera creates a calming and relaxing sleep environment that promotes daily freshness
Medium-plush feel; memory foam, transition foam, and coils bring soft and gentle comfort underpinned by a well-balanced layer of support
Created to provide luxury at an affordable price, this mattress is backed by a 10-year warranty against manufacturer defects
Compressed, rolled, and shipped in a box for simple setup; easily fits through narrow hallways and staircases
100 NIGHT RISK-FREE TRIAL: IF YOU ARE UNSATISFIED WITH THIS MATTRESS, YOU ARE ELIGIBLE FOR A FULL REFUND UP TO 100 DAYS FROM DATE OF RECEIPT

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,800 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 10-year u. S. Warranty guards against manufacturer defects.
specifications.Included Components: LUCID 10 Inch Queen Hybrid Mattress - Bamboo Charcoal and Aloe Vera Infused Memory Foam
